name: Flappy Sloan
description:
Our assignment was to make a Flappy bird clone. I took it as an opportunity to once again torture Sloan.

Controls:
JUMP- SPACEBAR/LEFT MOUSE BUTTON 
PAUSE MENU  - ESC KEY

It plays the same as the original Flappy Bird with one except the whole world starts moving as you reach point milestones.
**Note**

It isn't the same as what's shown in the GIF. I gave you much more time to get acclimated before spinning it all on you.

Please comment with things you want to see in the updates.
Thank you
